meaningMnemonic: You <radical>kiss</radical> <kanji>each</kanji> of your best pals to show them how much you love and care for them. You kiss each friend right on the mouth.
readingMnemonic: Actually, <kanji>each</kanji> of your best pals are of the <reading>cock</reading> (かく) variety. By that, I mean they are both roosters. Imagine kissing both of these cocks on their beaks.
